title: Why I decided to get the COVID vaccine
cleaned_text:
I like that you used your intuition and hope that it really was intuition and not some impulse from the mind, it can be difficult to discern sometimes. My intuition tells me to not take it. You thought it through well but it could still be a mistake, we don't know yet.

@Seraphim Yeah, honestly who knows. Intuition vs Mind...both are constructs at the end of the day. Hard to truly say what's what. And definitely hard to say whether it was the right decision or not, but it was the decision I made, so at least on a spiritual level, it was the perfect one
